Greenbush Station Place is to be built on a 1.4 acre site in the Greenbush section of Scituate MA. The third building will be mixed use consisting of six retail/office units and five residences.  Each building will have elevator service.  The zoning requires that four of the units must be affordable.  The owner will have the choice of offering the units as rentals or as condominiums.  There will be a total of 67 parking spaces.  A walking/bicycle path at the rear of the property will make it a short walk to the Greenbush Commuter Rail Station with daily 58 minute trips to Boston's South Station.  The site presently contains a historic building with 5 residential units which will be incorporated into the new mixed unit bldng.

Sad as they are to leave, they are excited to pass their dream space on to someone else who can love it the way they would have.
